name: Vase Simulator
description:
Someone misplaced a vase on the top of a 40 storey building. There are no stairways or ladders to bring it down safely. But fortunately, you have access to an endless supply of explosives.

Can you blast your way down the building and reach safe ground?

Be careful where you place your bombs and don't forget to keep distance.

Speed Mode included in which you have to play against the time.

Controls:

You move the vase with basic 2D platformer controls and place bombs with your mouse.

System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: DX10 capabilities
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM

Credits:

vase art: Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
